title: Bug 104630: Column icons don't show up in connecting Derby database
OB: When a Derby database is connected, the column icons in the Available Items section do not appear.
EB: When expanding the Data Source in the Available Items section, both table icons and column icons should be visible.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Create a new project. 
2. Create a new report. 
3. In the Data Explorer view, create a new Data Source to connect to a Derby database using the following details: 
   - Driver Class: com.ibm.db2.jcc.DB2Driver 
   - Database URL: jdbc:db2://spmdb:1527/gui 
   - User Name: root 
   - Password: root 
4. After setting up the Data Source, create a dataset. 
5. In the Edit Data Set window, select Query.
